tests.name: deserialize anonymous primitive - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K STRING KEY, foo INT) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false, kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: deserialize anonymous primitive - value - with coercion
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K STRING KEY, foo STRING) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false, kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: deserialize nested primitive - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K STRING KEY, foo INT) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=true, kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: deserialize anonymous array - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo ARRAY<STRING>) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false, kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: deserialize anonymous array - value - with coercion
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo ARRAY<STRING>) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false, kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: deserialize nested array - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo ARRAY<STRING>) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=true, kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: deserialize anonymous map - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo MAP<STRING, INT>) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false, kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: deserialize nested map - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo MAP<STRING, INT>) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=true, kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: serialize anonymous primitive - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K STRING KEY, foo BOOLEAN) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: serialize nested primitive - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K STRING KEY, foo BOOLEAN) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=true) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: serialize anonymous array - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo ARRAY<BIGINT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: serialize nested array - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo ARRAY<BIGINT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=true) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: serialize anonymous map - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo MAP<STRING, DOUBLE>) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: serialize nested map - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo MAP<STRING, DOUBLE>) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=true) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: serialize anonymous struct - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo STRUCT<F0 INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: serialize nested struct - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo STRUCT<F0 INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON_SR');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=true) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;
